pages.text: Wearing the full set of the Underzealot's clothing makes them neutral with you
pages.title: Underzealot Respect

pages.text: Allows a player to leash sacrificeable denizens and give them to Underzealots for their rituals by right clicking,
pages.title: Dark Offering

pages.text:
(REQUIRES 'Underzealot Respect' FOR THIS PART OF THE FEATURE) 
 If neutral with the Underzealots,They will give an item native to the Forlorn Hollows in return of offering them a sacrifice,What they give in return is dependant on the sacrifice type
